long_description: The fashionable Timex Weekender watch is an affordable timepiece that will stay in style for many seasons. It's the ideal accessory for a sophisticated yet casual look. Polished brass case and mineral crystal offer durability; clear, easy-to-read markers display 12- and 24-hr. time. INDIGLO(R) night light illuminates the display for easy use at night. Woven nylon strap is rugged yet comfortable. The Timex Weekender watch is water-resistant to 30m (100 ft.).
short_description: The fashionable Timex Weekender watch is an affordable timepiece that will stay in style for many seasons. It's the ideal accessory for a sophisticated yet casual look.
